title: reported
body: holy jesus....wtf is the problem with these players. theyll report you for EVERYTHING! losing lane? obv trolling. reported. misclick? reported.jungler no gank? reported. one guy throws a fight? reported.. can we chill the fuck out and stop reporting people for stupid reasons. shit happens. people are on tilt, they lose hard. its norms. just yesterday i had a game where i picked udyr jungle and i clearly told everyone i was gona afk farm til tri and zephyr. every1 said it was cool. not even 3 minutes in game and every lane dies. im trying to be patient and let my team hold it out so i can help take towers mid/late game. the whole time i have peopple spamming pings on me on kills i cant get! ( omfg udyr stop getting red and kill that 1/2 hp ori [who was 11-2 and 4 levels ahead of me]) and everyone on my team started harassing me for doing what i said i was gona do. i didnt say a word to them all game aside from "please try to hold lanes." then end game EVERYONE reports me even the enemy team cus my team told them i was being toxic..... i close the screen and i get a warning from rito -.- i KNOW i didnt say a word of poison to them all game and i was even warding to help them from being ganked.. how the hell does riot take these reports seriously? people report you for stupid reasons... every day i also see "report * for feeding/throwing" when a team loses....they need to take the report button off for people who spam that shit. accept ur loss and move on. stop tying to get "bad" players banned because you didnt win that NORMAL game
